title: In Defense of Stovepipe Hats
author: Lincoln, Abraham
notes_from_reviewers: I cannot say enough good things about this book. Should be required reading for all.
Hats off to Abraham Lincoln for what is sure to be another bestseller!

related_books.title: I Love My Homburg Hat
related_books.author: Churchill, Winston
notes_from_reviewers: Very enjoyable. Full of the wit and insight we've come to expect from Sir Churchill.

related_books.title: Bicorne Hats Are All The Rage These Days
related_books.author: Bonaparte, Napol√©on
notes_from_reviewers: It was in French and I don't speak French. Not sure why I bought this book.
I thought this was going to be a book about hats, but after chapter two it just turned into a 900 page rant about the metric system.
